contents: Article 24 (Dignity of Referees) ① Referees must wear an identification card issued by the Sports Council or the relevant organization. ② Referees must use only the clothing and equipment specified by the relevant organization. ③ Referees must sign up for necessary accident insurance. ④ Referees must comply with the articles of incorporation and related regulations of the relevant organization. ⑤ In the event of a misjudgment or biased decision, the referee may be subject to disciplinary action (reprimand) in accordance with the ‘Member Sports Organization Regulations’ of the sports association and the ‘Sports Fair Committee Regulations’ of the relevant organization or sports association. ⑥ Referees must not engage in any actions that undermine the fairness of their duties or duties as referees, such as arranging or cooperating with players or coaches to join a team (organization, etc.), contract, or other employment.
